last_episode_to_air.name: Just One Victory
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the Nova Corps defeated and the fate of the entire universe in jeopardy, the Guardians must turn to an unlikely ally to stop The Serpent.

name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
overview: Peter Quill is Star-Lord, the brash adventurer who, to save the universe from its greatest threats, joins forces with a quartet of disparate misfits — fan-favorite Rocket Raccoon, a tree-like humanoid named Groot, the enigmatic, expert fighter Gamora and the rough edged warrior Drax the Destroyer.

episodes.name: Road to Knowhere
episodes.overview: The newly-christened Guardians of the Galaxy come into possession of a dangerous artifact that has Thanos’ new lieutenant, Korath, after them.

episodes.name: Knowhere to Run
episodes.overview: The Guardians struggle to subdue the suddenly-sprung-to-life Celestial head that is the Knowhere space colony, as well as storm Korath’s ship to rescue Quill, Gamora and the mysterious CryptoCube that holds the Cosmic Seed.

episodes.name: One in a Million You
episodes.overview: Feeling underappreciated, Rocket accepts an offer to work for The Collector, only to realize his “job” is working as another prisoner in The Collector’s collection.

episodes.name: Take the Milano and Run
episodes.overview: The Guardians crash land on a space station run by the Grandmaster, who schemes to get Drax back in the gladiatorial arena to battle his ultimate opponent: Gamora.

episodes.name: Can't Fight This Seedling
episodes.overview: When Groot is infected by a parasitic fungus, the Guardians must embark on a perilous journey in order to save him.

episodes.name: Undercover Angle
episodes.overview: Caught red-handed by Titus, the Guardians are coerced into infiltrating a notorious gang of weapons dealers known as the Black Order.

episodes.name: The Backstabbers
episodes.overview: Quill gets mixed up in a game of deceit when Gamora tries to pit her siblings, Nebula and Korath, against each other.

episodes.name: Hitchin' a Ride
episodes.overview: Peter Quill is Star-Lord, the brash adventurer who, to save the universe from its greatest threats, joins forces with a quartet of disparate misfits â€” fan-favorite Rocket Raccoon, a tree-like humanoid named Groot, the enigmatic, expert fighter Gamora and the rough edged warrior Drax the Destroyer.

episodes.name: We Are Family
episodes.overview: Rocket is abducted and taken back to his home planet, Half World.

episodes.name: Bad Moon Rising
episodes.overview: The Guardians encounter a living planet that's fallen under the control of a revived Ronan.

episodes.name: Space Cowboys
episodes.overview: The Guardians get caught up in a rivalry between The Collector and The Grandmaster.

episodes.name: Crystal Blue Persuasion
episodes.overview: The Guardians must help save the City of Attilan from Ronan.

episodes.name: Stuck in the Metal with You
episodes.overview: The Guardians find the Asgardian Destroyer Armor that leads to an epic battle pitting the Detroyer Armor against Drax the Destroyer.

episodes.name: Don't Stop Believin'
episodes.overview: Quill goes missing while following the Cryptocube's readings.

episodes.name: Accidents Will Happen
episodes.overview: The Guardians must stop Ronan's plan to blow up the Kree Supreme Intelligence.

episodes.name: We Are the World Tree
episodes.overview: In search of the Cosmic Seed, the Guardians unexpectedly find themselves in Asgard where they must outwit Thor and Angela in order to discover the seed's origins.

episodes.name: Come and Gut Your Love
episodes.overview: Following a falling out with his father, Star-Lord finds a ship containing the A.I. Rora as he takes it off of Spartax with the Drax the Destroyer and Groot providing a diversion for the Spartax Royal Guards. Afterwards, the Guardians of the Galaxy have to deal with Lucy and Supergiant who are jilted that Star-Lord is the Prince of Sparta.

episodes.name: Asgard War (1): Lightnin' Strikes
episodes.overview: When Asgard attacks Spartax, Quill and the Guardians become caught in the middle trying to expose the deception behind the conflict.

episodes.name: Asgard War (2): Rescue Me
episodes.overview: The Guardians and Asgardians team up to rescue Quill from Thanos.

episodes.name: Fox on the Run
episodes.overview: Gamora attempts to make amends for her past misdeeds only to find herself in a deadly trap set by Nebula, Ronan and the Grandmaster.

episodes.name: Inhuman Touch
episodes.overview: The Guardians pay the Inhumans a visit to learn more about the Cosmic Seed.

episodes.name: Welcome Back
episodes.overview: The Guardians discover that the Cosmic Seed is back on Earth. In the company of Cosmo, Star-Lord returns to his hometown where he runs into his childhood bully Michael Coogan who is now the sheriff. Now Star-Lord and the Guardians of the Galaxy must find the Cosmic Seed before Korath the Pursuer does.

episodes.name: I've Been Searching So Long
episodes.overview: When the Guardians of the Galaxy's search for the Cosmic Seed continues on Earth, Star-Lord contacts Gorgon where he gets the location of the former site of Attilan. While checking out the area, Rocket Raccoon, Groot, and Drax the Destroyer have visions of the Cosmic Seed energy helping them out like Rocket Raccoon's family being re-evolved, Groot being able to restore the Flora colossi, and Drax the Destroyer being able to see his family again. Even after fighting their way past the Cosmic Seed-enhanced worms and spiders, the Guardians of the Galaxy must keep Ronan the Accuser and Nebula from getting the box containing the Cosmic Seed.

episodes.name: I Feel the Earth Move
episodes.overview: Now that Thanos has the Cosmic Seed, he takes control of the Earth and molds it into his personal planetary weapon of mass destruction. The Guardians of the Galaxy must work to reclaim the Cosmic Seed from Thanos even when Ronan the Accuser and Nebula plan to dispose of Thanos with plans of having the Earth be destroyed alongside him.

episodes.name: Won't Get Fooled Again
episodes.overview: The Guardians discover that Yondu has been impersonating them in order to con unsuspecting victims.

episodes.name: Jingle Bell Rock
episodes.overview: The team stages a Christmas Carol inspired con-job in order to frighten a despot out of his ill-gotten riches and free his enslaved people.

episodes.name: Stayin' Alive
episodes.overview: While trying to dispose of Thanos' asteroid, the Guardians discover it has been taken to a secure facility that belongs to the Avengers.

episodes.name: Evolution Rock
episodes.overview: The Guardians and the Avengers team up to find out what powerful secrets lie inside Thanos' asteroid.

episodes.name: Lyin' Eyes
episodes.overview: When Rocket and Drax wake up with absolutely no memory of the night before, the Guardians must piece together their adventures.

episodes.name: Free Bird
episodes.overview: While the Guardians search for the missing sarcophagus, Groot finds a mysterious egg and does everything in his power to protect it.

episodes.name: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun
episodes.overview: When the Guardians are charged with escorting the young and rebellious Rigellian Princess Tana back home, Drax's hardened heart melts as he is reminded of his own daughter.

episodes.name: Black Helmet Woman
episodes.overview: After being infused with incredible power from a Nova Helmet, Gamora leads the Guardians and her sister Nebula on a mission to infiltrate the Believer flagship.

episodes.name: Right Place, Wrong Time
episodes.overview: Quill and Gamora battle the High Evolutionary, his minion hybrids and a teleport-hijacking Nebula.

episodes.name: Me and You and a Dog Named Cosmo
episodes.overview: Cosmo goes undercover on the Believer Flagship but loses his powers when his cover is blown.

episodes.name: Can't Get It Out Of My Head
episodes.overview: When the Believer Flagship embeds itself in Knowhere's brain, it causes a planetoid-wide telekinetic zombie outbreak.

episodes.name: Rock Your Baby
episodes.overview: When the cocoon opens and reveals a baby warlock inside, the Guardians have to step in to be a positive guiding force to keep his powers in check.

episodes.name: Symbiote War (1): Wild World
episodes.overview: The Guardians discover Groot's homeworld, Planet X, has been overrun by Symbiotes who will stop at nothing to get Groot's restarted World Pod for themselves to conquer the galaxy.

episodes.name: Symbiote War (2): I Will Survive
episodes.overview: As a comet covered in Symbiotes hurls toward Spartax, the Guardians must team up with Quill's sister to save the planet.

episodes.name: Symbiote War (3): Thunder Road
episodes.overview: When the Symbiotes escape to Asgard and venomize Thor, Odin and the other Asgardians, it is up to the Guardians to save them, the World Tree and all of existence.

episodes.name: Back in Black
episodes.overview: The Guardians meet Sam Alexander, an Earth teen experimenting with his father’s Nova helmet, but the Guardians aren’t the only ones who know of the helmet’s power.

episodes.name: Knights in Black Helmets
episodes.overview: The Guardians chase after J’son and Mantis as they try to manipulate Sam to do their bidding by promising him clues to the location of his missing father.

episodes.name: Nova Me, Nova You
episodes.overview: When the Nova Corps catch up with the Guardians and Sam, the fight reaches Sam’s hometown.

episodes.name: Mr. Roboto
episodes.overview: Searching for a weapon strong enough to match J’son, the Guardians seek out master boom-maker Ja Kyee.

episodes.name: Destroyer
episodes.overview: When the guardians travel to Drax's home planet in hopes of summoning Warlock, they discover Xeron seeks to destroy Adam and Drax's homecoming, which becomes a fight to protect his friends.

episodes.name: You Can't Always Get What You Want
episodes.overview: Rocket and Warlock travel to Halfworld to try and re-evolve Rocket's family.

episodes.name: I've Seen All Good People
episodes.overview: Gamora trains Warlock to be a strong and powerful warrior like herself. But when Gamora’s lessons become too intense, Warlock clams up and gets kidnapped by the Collector.

episodes.name: Another One Bites the Dust
episodes.overview: When Quill and Warlock are hunted by J'son and the Black Order, Quill teaches Warlock the importance of never letting himself slip into the path of evil.

episodes.name: It's Tricky
episodes.overview: During the Xandrian Feast of the Three Grinning Moons, the Guardians must pull a reverse heist by planting a dangerous weapon inside a Nova Corps vault.

episodes.name: You're No Good
episodes.overview: Warlock has gone dark! By absorbing J’son into his gem, Warlock has become Dark Warlock (Magus) with his sights set on conquering the galaxy, starting with Spartax.

episodes.name: Behind Gold Eyes
episodes.overview: The Guardians and Nova battle Dark Warlock (Magus) and J’son on Planet Y. Can our heroes save their friend Warlock and the universe before it’s too late?

episodes.name: Unfortunate Son
episodes.overview: In order to save the Guardians from the ruthless asteroid Korvac, Quill must bust J'Son out of prison on Spartax and in the process he sees a new side of his father.

episodes.name: Mission: Breakout
episodes.overview: The Guardians must work together to escape the elaborate prisons created for them by The Collector.

episodes.name: Back in the New York Groove
episodes.overview: The Guardians meet up with Spider-Man in New York City to defeat Thanos’ super-powered symbiote.

episodes.name: Drive My Carnage
episodes.overview: The Guardians team up with Spider-Man to battle Thanos, who has harnessed the power of the Carnage Symbiote to become the ultimate weapon.

episodes.name: I Fought the Law
episodes.overview: The Guardians have captured Thanos, but it's no easy task transporting the most wanted criminal in the galaxy.

episodes.name: Titan Up
episodes.overview: The Guardians chase Thanos and Sam Alexander (Nova) to Thanos’ home planet of Titan, where they discover a gladiatorial arena featuring Jesse Alexander - Nova’s father!

episodes.name: Money Changes Everything
episodes.overview: The Guardians now have everything they ever dreamed of, but money can’t solve their problems.

episodes.name: Sisters Are Doin' It for Themselves
episodes.overview: Gamora decides to use her new riches to repay all of the people she has wronged throughout the years. When Nebula shows up, Gamora tries to teach her the value of doing good.

episodes.name: We Are the Champions
episodes.overview: Drax decides he no longer wants to be a Destroyer and looks into new occupations.

episodes.name: Fame
episodes.overview: Quill starts his own talk show after beating Thanos! But to his dismay, everyone seems to hate it, especially the Grandmaster who is rigging the segments to destroy Quill.

episodes.name: Happy Together
episodes.overview: The Guardians squander their riches and take on a simple transport job. It turns out that they are stealing from the Kree, and Phyla the Accuser will do anything to get it back!

episodes.name: Gotta Get Outta this Place
episodes.overview: The Guardians find themselves in prison for stealing a mysterious package from the Kree - but it was all a set up by Howard the Duck.

episodes.name: Long Distance Runaround
episodes.overview: The Guardians track down Howard the Duck to find out who set them up and why, but they don’t get far before Phyla the Accuser catches up to them to deliver some Kree justice.

episodes.name: You Don't Own Me
episodes.overview: Phyla-Vell reluctantly teams up with the Guardians to bring The Collector to justice for destroying her home planet.

episodes.name: Black Vortex (1)
episodes.overview: When the Guardians become separated in the Black Vortex, Gamora wakes up in a children’s fairy tale, while Drax is trapped in a comic book.

episodes.name: Black Vortex (2)
episodes.overview: While caught in a CG sinister packing factory, Rocket must search for his best friend Groot and escape.

episodes.name: Black Vortex (3)
episodes.overview: Quill finds himself in a claymation world where the Milano is flying into the sun, threatening to melt him. Meanwhile, Groot and Drax must fight Ronan in a Golden Age world.

episodes.name: Black Vortex (4)
episodes.overview: Gamora and Quill battle their way through an 8-bit Super Marvel World.

episodes.name: Blame It on the Boss of Nova
episodes.overview: The Guardians finally make it out of the Black Vortex, only to find that the galaxy has been taken over by sinister robots called the Darkhawks, who are disguised as their friends.

episodes.name: The Real Me
episodes.overview: The Guardians don’t know who to trust as the Darkhawks seem to have duplicated everyone, including Quill.

episodes.name: Paranoid
episodes.overview: The Guardians finally make it out of the Black Vortex, only to find that the galaxy has been taken over by sinister robots called the Darkhawks, who are disguised as their friends.

episodes.name: Darkhawks on the Edge of Town
episodes.overview: The Guardians don't know who to trust as the Darkhawks seem to have duplicated everyone, including Quill.

episodes.name: Holding Out for a Hero
episodes.overview: The Guardians have to team up with Loki in Asgard when The Serpent infects the World Tree and threatens to destroy the universe.

episodes.name: With a Little Help From My Friends
episodes.overview: As the Guardians prepare to take the fight to The Serpent, they Bifrost around the galaxy to gather reinforcements.

episodes.name: Breaking Stuff is Hard to Do
episodes.overview: The Guardians and their friends search for the fragments of Dragonfang, a legendary weapon that will finally be able to defeat The Serpent forever.

episodes.name: Killer Queen
episodes.overview: The Guardians, Loki and Iron Man travel to the castle of the evil Hela to ask her help in fighting The Serpent.

episodes.name: Just One Victory
episodes.overview: With the Nova Corps defeated and the fate of the entire universe in jeopardy, the Guardians must turn to an unlikely ally to stop The Serpent.
